text:
42Floors (http://42floors.com/)

San Francisco, CA

We're looking for extremely talented people to help us bring the commercial real estate industry into the 21st century.

Hiring salespeople, operations coordinators, data analysts, market researchers, admins/EAs, full stack engineers, and back-end engineers. (Apply: http://42floors.com/jobs)

All positions are full time, SF-based.

YC W12, $18m in funding from NEA, Bessemer, Thrive, SV Angel, etc. (http://42floors.com/investors)

Learn more about us here: http://42floors.com/press or email me with any questions!
